abilities.name: Kindred Hero
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[LETHAL HITS]** ability.

abilities.name: Grim Efficiency
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, in your Command phase, you can select one model from your army with this ability, then select one enemy unit that is visible to that model. That enemy unit gains 1 Judgement token.

abilities.name: Rampart Crest
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Teleport Crest
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.

wargear_abilities.name: Rampart Crest
wargear_abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

wargear_abilities.name: Teleport Crest
wargear_abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.

wargear_options: ■ This model’s Autoch-pattern combi-bolter can be replaced with 1 volkanite disintegrator.
■ This model’s forgewrought plasma axe can be replaced with 1 mass gauntlet.
■ This model’s rampart crest can be replaced with 1 teleport crest.
